column5: Congratulations to both of you That is one beautiful rig!!! Leechman
Yes Good things sure do come to those who wait....congrats....enjoy!
I know it has been said before but, WOW. Way to nice it up
Nice haircut Paul..Court date? Joe
Now that is one SWEET boat!!! Congrats on the newest member of your family!!!
Beauty machine. Congrats, now go catch-em
L*M*A*O*...Damn I love this site !!!  Congrats on the new boat...nice...real nice...
Wow very nice Joey and Paul you will be all set for fishing in November.  Congrats you two deserve it I am looking forward to the first fishing report aboard the new vessel.
Oh and I promise to never offer to tie it to the dock or even tie mine on the same lake. Dan
SWEET!!!!  you'll be fishing in comfort this year  congrats! and  Enjoy!!!  Maureen
Very nice looking package there, well thought out! Congratulations you two, you deserve it!
Thats a sweet ride. I'm a little jealous  Congrats!  Sinker
That may be my dream boat. Congratulations on such a sweet ride.
Beautiful!!! That's my dream rig!!! Use it in good health and may you slime it!!
awesome !!!  Congrats and enjoy ( like i had to say that LOL)  tb
Thanks every one. I will have many years to enjoy the new boat.  Already have looked into what I can do to the engine(when warranty is up)
Wow that is an extremely fine boat. Congrats. Can't wait to see you guys putting some fish in it.  Just to confirm who is the Captain and who is the cabin boy?  Just fooling.  Nemo
WOW  super rig there..  See you at Bronte
congrats awesome ride you will love the it
Congrats ....you guys deserve that  Paul looks really good cleaned up i had to look twice
SHOTGUN!!!  Hmmmmm....I guess that will be Paul's seat since Joey will be doing the driving.    Ok then back seat it is!      Enjoy the new ride folks, looking forward to the reports.
Really super rig. Not sure what you're going to like more the Lund or the Verado, but I know you'll love the Verado if you've not owned one before.

Congrats! You already know, but you are going to love the comfort and fishability of that boat.  You will be amazed at the smoothness of the DTS shifting and how quiet the Verado is  A very well-informed decision and like most things in life it is better to wait and do it right than rush into something you won't be satisfied with.  If you PM me your email I can send you a great document about care, maintenance and general info for your Verado, some great information in it.  Cheers, Tony

Really nice boat! WOW........awesome in fact.....if it was anyone else i'd be jealous...but i aint got time to be jealous cuz i'm too pleased for ya Joey.....i'd say enjoy.....but thats a foregone conclusion....lol.
Very nice, now go get it wet...
Really nice rig guys! Congrats. ... however, I may have gone with the Opti, for no other reason that it would drown out Paul all day long! LMAO HH
Beauty!!!
That's what the stereo is for Joe
All I can say is WOW.   That's one great looking machine.
Beauty boat, I can only dream about one at this time. I really like the cap on your truck though, it matches quite nicely. Where'd ya get it?
a beauty. that will sure look good on l. st clair. cmon down and try her out.
I'm happy for you guys!!!
WOW  That there is a thing of beauty.  I wish you both good luck and hope you enjoy it.  Your right...good things come to good people who wait.  Cheers  Craig
Absolutely beautiful rig! Don't see too many kickers with a 4 blade prop.
Just wow, I'm very jealous.  I'm interested in buying a similar package this year, do you mind saying how much it cost around? Or maybe in a PM if you want to keep it private? Once again congrats!
beauty! congrats!
Very nice boat.  Did you pick that up in the states?  Care to chare the dealer's info?  Thanks.
Now thats what I'm talkin 'bout!Nice score guys. Joe
very nice looking guys I cant wait to see her this fall I like the idea of the hole in the side of the cover for tending to the rods or what ever ya need to do in the rain or late fall days.
Nice boat. Enjoy.
Man... that's sure gonna clash with my Cobalt Blue when parked at our dock !!!  I ting of beauty it is..... a ting of beauty.
:worthy:  Oh yeah, and

Thanks everyone.  Paul is still out there tinkering with it.  Fishing777, you have a PM.  Dutch, we bought it from a dealer in the states.  He was a great guy and met us at the Sarnia border today.  We didn't even have to go through customs, he came to the Canadian side.  The dealer is Maple Bay Marine in Michigan.  I highly recommend them.  Joey
thatsa really perty boat yall got their. Congratulations to the both of you   Art
Ya, we liked that too, a nice little zipper there so you can unzip and pour out your cold coffee or blow your smoke out, give someone who crossed your lines the finger
VERY NICE!  My dream upgrade!
Nice Boat!
extremely nice....I am sooooooooooooooooooo jealous!!
SIIICK!!  Monay.  Now all's ya need is a new truck to haul her with!!  See you love birds at Lakair!  HD
wow that is a nice rig.
what a great looking boat!  Enjoy!!!  Cheers!
Very, Very sweet - congrats to both of you!
Nice boat, how big is the tank(gas, not livewell)?
Very nice Joey and Paul.  Congrats
WOW, that is one sweet boat Joey, I mean really sweet.  Congrats on getting it, now I hope you two put it to some good use, lots of use.  BTW, is that Paul with his hair cut?
It's his evil twin  Yes, that would be him.  Joey
Joey and Paul, Two words come immediately to mind.......HOLY CRAP!!!!!! That is a fine looking fishing machine you have there. Enjoy and congrats!!!

All I can say is congrats and that I am in total ahhhhhhhh.A Lund Pro v and a Verodo and a 9.9 Pro kicker.That boat totally screams B L I NG.Congrat a totally great boat for two totally great people.You and Paul totally have earned it.Now come on out on Saturday and put some salmon slime in it. Long Live the LUND> Dan
Paul and I have waited for this day for quite some time.  I'll let the pictures speak for themselves
Beautiful.
WOW
I want one!
Youve achieved my dream boat............only a little earlier than i will lol
Wow Beautiful  That should attract plenty o' fish!  What's the HP on the big motor?
Oh my goodness it's a Lund in my favourite colour. That is sooooo nice!
Congrat's, she's a beauty!
dude and dudette that thing is beautiful that is the one I dream about, a matter of fact I am get a ...never mind  what size is the motor?
The Engine is a 200 HP Verado.
Great looking boat congrats to you and Paul get the riggers on it and come out with us on Saturday  Rob
He's installing the riggers as we speak - A couple of Cannon Mag 10 HS  And as a matter of fact, we are heading out to do just that Saturday.  Where are you launching from?
Congratulations! Jim
WOW!!!!!  Very very nice you two! There'll be no stopping you now! That really is a beauty. CONGRATS!!!!!
I think I just wet myself.  Beautiful boat!
Hey Joey where going out of Bronte Percher put a post up Mikethepike and Slowpoke are going out to
Now that is a beautiful looking boat  Can't wait to see the first report,hope it's a big slimey muskie to break in the new boat smell    Streamerguy
That would be a woody. Do fishermen (and I use the men part advisedly) call that a finny or a claspery or something?  JF
Okay. So nona these guys are racing ya. Horsepower is a goodness. Waytago!!!!  JF
Awesome machine congratulations!
No! Don't catch any fish and slime-up that beautiful boat.  Fish are slimy, smelly and sometimes do things when in a boat.
that is some frigging sweet congrats  shes a beauty
Beautiful! Just Beautiful! Congrads on the boat!  Thats the exact boat i want.
A Magnificent vessel!!!  ... but if Paul catches that guy with short hair futzin around in his boat... there's going to be trouble!!!
